original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

translated: I recall that in the past, when I was practicing bodhisattva conduct, I was always afraid of saṃsāra, seeking to do whatever was virtuous.

analyzed: sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i yid du gyur pa na rmi lam 'di lta bu rmis pa dran te / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng che zhing yangs pa zhig na bdag 'dug ste /

analyzed: de na sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar na bkod pa /

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams kyis tshar chod cing lus 'bar ba dang / kun tu 'bar ba dang / mer gyur pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub cing drag pa srog 'phrog pa'i tshor ba myong bar gyur nas nga ga la ba der lhags so //

analyzed: bdag cag ni sdug bsngal zhing sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba mi bzad pa'i nang na mchis te /

analyzed: shin tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub cing drag pa srog 'phrog pa'i tshor ba myong zhing /

original: mgon ma mchis /🔽skyabs ma mchis /
analyzed: mgon ma mchis / skyabs ma mchis /
translated: We have no protector.🔽We have no refuge.

original: dpung gnyen @168b ma mchis so //
analyzed: dpung gnyen @168b ma mchis so //
translated: We have no ally.

original: skyes bu dam pa khyod bzhed na ni bdag cag sdug bsngal 'di lta bu 'di las khyod kyis yongs su thar bar mdzad spyod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa khyod bzhed na ni bdag cag sdug bsngal 'di lta bu 'di las khyod kyis yongs su thar bar mdzad spyod do zhes zer ro //
translated: If you, holy being, would only save us from this kind of suffering.”

analyzed: kun dga' bo / nga rmi lam de nyid na du zhing mig gnyis nas 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de ltar ma 'jigs shig /

analyzed: ngas khyed sdug bsngal chen po 'di lta bu 'di las yongs su thar bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyung ngo //
translated: I will completely liberate you from this great suffering.”

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: ngas rmi lam nyid na sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gcig tu gsog nas lag pa g-yas pas mgo la byugs so //

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi spyi bor lag pa g-yas pa bzhag ma thag pa dang / sems can khyed ngas thar bar bya'i /

analyzed: ma 'jigs shig ces ngas de skad smras ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba pa'i me de zhi bar gyur to //

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang skad cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid la bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur to; ;kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

analyzed: nga gnyid kyis log pa de nyid las sad ma thag tu mchi ma de gos las btsir nas bsags so //

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

analyzed: nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa @169a *//
translated: When I was practicing bodhisattva conduct,

translated: Now that I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, what need is there to mention it?

analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /

analyzed: nyan thos rnams dang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lta ga la yod /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams la snying rje chen po ji tsam zhig dang ldan pa tshig tu brjod pas kyang mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i dngos
translated: It is not easy to express the extent of the great compassion that the Thus-Gone One had for sentient beings when he was practicing bodhisattva conduct in the past.🔽🔽

analyzed: po'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos /
translated: The Thus-Gone One, when he was practicing bodhisattva conduct in the past, had such great compassion for sentient beings that it is not easy to describe it fully. Look at how he had a mind that was truly beneficial for sentient beings.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: de nas tshong pa de dag gru zhig pas 'jigs /

analyzed: de'i tshe'ang tshong pa lnga zhig rgya mtsho chen pos khyer ba de dag ded dpon de la /

analyzed: kye ded dpon mi 'jigs pa stsol cig ces 'bod do //

analyzed: kun dga' bo /

analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / ded dpon des tshong pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: kye skyes bu khyed ma 'jigs shig /

translated: Immediately, that corpse was pulled out of the great ocean onto dry land.

analyzed: de nas tshong pa lnga po de dag bde zhing don grub nas rgya mtsho chen po las brgal te slar dzambu gling du @170a *//
